actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to require $1 coins issued during 2019 to honor President George H. W. Bush and to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue bullion coins during 2019 in honor of Barbara Bush.
short_title: President George H. W. Bush and Barbara Bush Dollar Coin Act
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
President George H. W. Bush and Barbara Bush Dollar Coin Act

This bill requires the issuance of

 $1 coins bearing the image of President George H.W. Bush for a one-year period beginning on January 1, 2019, and bullion coins bearing the image of Barbara Bush during that same period.

titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to require $1 coins issued during 2019 to honor President George H. W. Bush and to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue bullion coins during 2019 in honor of Barbara Bush.
